import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useParams, useHistory, useRouteMatch } from "react-router-dom"; import Breadcrumb from "./Breadcrumb" import {listCards} from "../utils/api/index" export default function StudyCards({ deck }){ const [flip, setFlip] = useState(false) const handleFlip = () => setFlip((val) => val = !flip) const { url } = useRouteMatch(); const [cards, setCards] = useState([]); const abortController = new AbortController(); const signal = abortController.signal; const cardTest = deck.cards if(cards.length <= 2){ return ( <>

Not enough cards.

You need at least 3 cards to study. There are {cards.length}

) } if(flip === false){ return ( <>

Study: {deck.name}

Card {currentIndex+1} of {cards.length}

{cardTest[currentIndex].front}

) } return ( <>

Study: {deck.name}

Card {currentIndex+1} of {cards.length}

{cardTest[currentIndex].back}

) }
